summary: This is a black and blue retexture of the Dovahwear found in Vimune Follower Mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][b][u]

Hello and Welcome

[/u]My name is Memorie and this is the first uploaded I've ever done.
Although, I have no clue how to mod, I have been taught how to retexture.
[u]
[/u]This is a Retexture I made for the Dovahwear found in
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59028/?]Vimune - Kitten Khajiit Companion[/url] made by StikTrooper

I would also like to credit KANRAx2 and KurooNeko
For making [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49292/?]Kankaraya[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76962/?]KuroNeko Photo Studio
[/url]

[u]Requierments:
[/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59028/?]Vimune - Kitten Khajiit Companion[/url][u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59028/?]
[/url][/u]That's all

[u]Installaion

[/u]Only pick one file!!![u]

[/u]Install with any mod manager
and overwrite when asked



[u]Credits[/u]
[url=http://https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1026301/?]StikTrooper[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2497805/?]KANRAx2
[/url][/b][/font][b][font=Comic Sans MS][/font][/b][b][font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/34871495/?]KurooNeko[/url][/font][/b][/center]
author: DraziaXardei
